title: Capitol Reef National Park: Park Home
body: Discover the Waterpocket Fold, a geologic wrinkle on earth!  Located in south-central Utah in the heart of red rock country, Capitol Reef National Park is a hidden treasure filled with cliffs, canyons, domes and bridges in the Waterpocket Fold, a geologic monocline (a wrinkle on the earth) extending almost 100 miles.                History   Capitol Reef's rich cultural history dates to archaic hunter-gatherers, the pre-historic Fremont Culture, and pioneer homesteaders.         Geology   Find out about the geologic processes that created the Waterpocket Fold.
